TCName.name: CreateDeletedArticleOML
TCName.deletedarticles: SELECT MATNR,PS_ARTICLE_STATUS,PS_STAT_START_DATE,PS_STAT_END_DATE,LIFNR,ALC_STATUS FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING WHERE ALC_STATUS = 'DA' /*PS_ARTICLE_STATUS = '02'*/ AND MATNR IN (SELECT MATNR FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER) ORDER BY ALC_STATUS DESC

TCName.name: instoreOMLNFF
TCName.articlesNFF: select distinct master.matnr,master.online_desc,ean.EAN11 from saap.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING list,saap.zwowc_article_master master,saap.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_HIER_XREF hier,saap.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_EAN ean,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM uom where list.matnr=master.MATNR and master.matnr=hier.matnr and master.matnr=ean.matnr and master.matnr = uom.matnr and master.PBD_IND='N' and list.PS_ARTICLE_STATUS not in ('08','ZA') and master.FRESH_FOOD_FLAG!='Y' and master.matnr not in (select matnr from ZWOWC_PROMO_ITM) and list.alc_status not in ('ES','EC') and master.MATNR in (select matnr from SAAP.ZWOWC_ART_SALES_PRICE where SALES_PRICE > 1 ) and master.matnr in (select matnr from saap.MAT_VIEW_ZWOW_ARTICLES_HIER where dept in nonfreshfood)

TCName.name: instoreOMLNFFdesc
TCName.articlesNFF: select distinct master.matnr,master.online_desc from saap.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING list,saap.zwowc_article_master master,ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM uom where list.matnr=master.MATNR and master.matnr = uom.matnr and master.PBD_IND='N' and master.FRESH_FOOD_FLAG!='Y' and master.matnr not in (select matnr from ZWOWC_PROMO_ITM) and list.alc_status not in ('ES','EC') and master.MATNR in (select matnr from SAAP.ZWOWC_ART_SALES_PRICE where SALES_PRICE > 1 ) and master.matnr in (select matnr from saap.MAT_VIEW_ZWOW_ARTICLES_HIER where dept in nonfreshfood)

TCName.name: BlockedProcurement
TCName.articles: SELECT MATNR,PS_ARTICLE_STATUS,PS_STAT_START_DATE,PS_STAT_END_DATE,LIFNR,ALC_STATUS FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING WHERE PS_ARTICLE_STATUS = '02' AND MATNR IN (SELECT MATNR FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER) and ALC_STATUS not in ('ES','EC') and MATNR in (select matnr from SAAP.ZWOWC_ART_SALES_PRICE where SALES_PRICE > 1 )

TCName.name: EOS
TCName.articles: SELECT * FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER WHERE MATNR IN (SELECT MATNR FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING WHERE ALC_STATUS = 'ES') AND PBD_IND = 'N'

TCName.name: EOSConfirmation
TCName.articles: SELECT * FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER WHERE MATNR IN (SELECT MATNR FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING WHERE ALC_STATUS = 'EC') AND PBD_IND = 'N'

TCName.name: ProductRecall
TCName.articles: SELECT * FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER WHERE MATNR IN (SELECT MATNR FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING WHERE PS_ARTICLE_STATUS = '08' AND ALC_STATUS NOT IN ('RA','DA','NA')) AND PBD_IND = 'N'

TCName.name: ReadyForArchiving
TCName.articles: SELECT MATNR,ALC_STATUS,PS_ARTICLE_STATUS FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING WHERE MATNR IN (SELECT MATNR FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER WHERE PBD_IND = 'N' ) AND PS_ARTICLE_STATUS = 'ZA' AND ALC_STATUS NOT IN ('RA','DA','NA')
